content: Career Asked by AnonymousAsked on 25 Oct 2018I graduated with an accounting degree from SMU, but I'm worried if there career progression as an accountant?I have friends who told me horror stories of their colleagues being in the same job for 3 years with no promotion or pay increment. Is accounting a dead-end job?1 answerAnswerBump0

Png Cheng Xi Damien, Happy Life Seeker at HomeLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 26 Oct 2018There will always be a need for accountants, but IT can replace most entry-level tasks. You will do well if you gain experience and improve yourself further in the area of financial compliance, consultany, IT, and data analytics.0 comments0
